# list_all_categories { #py_mealdb.MealDB.list_all_categories }

```python
MealDB.list_all_categories()
```

Retrieves a simple list of all category names.

| Name   | Type         | Description                                    |
|--------|--------------|------------------------------------------------|
|        | CategoryList | CategoryList object containing category names. |
